content: there s nothing more magical and eye catching than a concert of colors underneath the glow of a black light this captivating cowl gives an incredible performance both on the needles and off the cowl is worked in the round using slip-stitch mosaic knitting to keep the texture of the chevron crisp and the backdrops bold the mosaic shifts from stockinette to garter stitch and back again mesmerizing dramatic and angular go ahead knit yourself a showstopper finished measurements circumference 26 inches/ 66 cm length 11 inches/28 cm materials worsted weight cyca #4 yarn in two colors about 200 yards each color yarn snob a wondrous worsted 100%superwash merino wool 218/200 per 100g skein mc happiness 1 skein cc blackout 1 skein gauge 16 sts/23 rounds = 4 inches/10cm in stockinette stitch 16 5 sts/39 rounds = 4 inches/10 cm in pattern stitch using larger needle recommended needle size us #9/5 5mm circular needle 16-24 inch/40-60cm length us #7/4 5mm circular needle 16-24 inch/40-60cm length notions 6 stitch markers one of a distinct style or color yarn needle
